name: Finoit Technologies Inc.
tagline: Your Technology Partner- Software | Web | Mobile
description:
Finoit is a software product engineering company that builds scalable, intuitive and secure software, web apps and mobile app products.
We help our customers in building:
- MVPs(Minimum viable product) for disruptive ideas and scaling those MVPs into full-fledged ​software ​products.
- POC (Proof of concept) for internal business processes and new ideas
- Application modernization of legacy software
 
With our technology consulting and implementation services using Web, Mobile and IoT development technologies, we have delivered intuitive digital experiences and scalable products while solving business problems to over 250 customers across North America, Europe and Australia.
 
READ MORE...

locations.address: Suite 202, 600 E. John Carpenter Fwy, Irving
